description: Designed and developed interactives, charts, and newsroom tools. Contributed to data-driven investigations at the intersection of gun violence and criminal justice, public health, and campaign finance. Managed a staff reporter; trained colleagues in data analysis and visualization; oversaw editorial partnerships. Received 2018 Deadline Club award; shortlisted for 2019 Data Journalism award.
Designed and built interactives, graphics, and feature articles. Developed digital newsroom strategy and achieved significant growth in online traffic. Trained and supervised digital intern.
Redesigned and maintained station website; improved livestreaming to grow online listenership. Recorded and edited radio content, including shows, ad spots, and interviews.
Conducted research and post-production work for a feature-length television documentary. Contributed editing to several other documentaries.
Developed lessons and materials to teach English to international groups of adults.
Directed and produced a series of short documentaries about artists and material culture.
Produced tutorial videos, newsletters, and other marketing materials for a database development company.
